overview: Sam often prefers to minimize unknowns, striving to understand the rationale behind everything.
Sam tends to be pragmatic, independent, and logical when making decisions.
Sam tends to be a highly-focused executer who gets right to the point in a conversation.
Sam may often ask precise questions and are likely to enjoy digging into specifics to make decisions.
Sam tends to be direct in verbalizing concerns and likely will not leave things open to interpretation.
